module.name: elemental_geometric_shape
module.keywords: module, geometry, mapping, template instance, point, transformation

inscope.li: definition of a geometric coordinate space;
definition of a point expressed using cartesian coordinates;
definition of a coordinate system or axis placement;
definition of a 2d or 3d geometric transformation by a 2*3 or 3*4 matrix;
definition of a geometric transformation from the data of a source axis_placement and of the axis_placement that results from its transformation;
definition of a geometric transformation from the data of a source axis_placement and of the 2*3 or 3*4 matrix that results from its transformation.

outscope.li: specification of various geometric modelling approaches for shape representation, such as wireframe or boundary representations. These various representations are dealt with in specific modules, each dedicated to a kind of representation.

uof.name: Elemental_Geometric_Shape
uof.description: The Elemental_Geometric_Shape UoF specifies the base constructs needed for the representation of geometric information.
